dcterms:creator: Morris Swadesh
dcterms:description: A list of semantic concepts that are represented in all languages, composed by Morris Swadesh. The dataset includes an extended list of 205 different English words available on Wiktionary.
dcterms:title: SWADESH Words

dcterms:creator: Francisco Pereira
Bin Lou
Brianna Pritchett
Samuel Ritter
Samuel J. Gershman
Nancy Kanwisher
Matthew Botvinick
Evelina Fedorenko
dcterms:description: A selection of semantic concepts obtained through spectral clustering on word representations, originally selected for brain imaging experiments on semantic language processing in humans. The dataset includes 180 words covering various parts of speech.
dcterms:title: PEREIRA Words

dcterms:creator: Philipp Koehn
dcterms:description: A parallel corpus extracted from the proceedings of the European Parliament, containing sentence-aligned versions in 21 European languages. The dataset is used for statistical machine translation and includes sentences of varying lengths.
dcterms:title: EUROPARL Sentences
